Welcome to Fragapy’s documentation!¶

Fragapy is shared library made and sustained by people from Fragaria, s.r.o. to aviod reinventing the wheel for things that have been written before.

The library has no precise aim so you should think about it as heap of things that proven to be useful and so someone has put them here.

Contents:

  • Adminhelp
  • Amazon
    • AWS branded scripts
    • SES SMTP relay
    • SMTP relay daemon
  • Authentication/Authorization utilities
    • PermissionDeniedMiddleware
  • Common utitlities
    • Current site, STATIC_URL context processors
    • Middleware for limiting access, shortening HTML responses
    • {% macro %} templatetag
  • Ella utilities
    • Multiple article contents
    • Send email about Publishable
    • Utilities for markup customization
    • JavaScript HitCounts
  • Printable output to ODT files (OpenOffice format)
    • Installation
    • OdtPrintable class
  • Soft deletable models
  • Static sitemaps
    • Installation
    • CRON job to generate sitemaps
  • Unix tools
  • Versioning
